runs.comm: gets steep bounce from outside off stump to this length delivery as the left-hander plays well inside the line
another beauty which just flies past the bat as Amjad is seriously wondering how to face this?
locates the perfect line and length as he pitches it up, but not before getting some away shape as Amjad presented the blade
resorts to his traditional length, with this fired in wider of off. Left well alone, and perhaps not necessarily by choice either

gets him to play at this fuller length on the pads which is glanced uppishly to the short leg, where Nasir is stationed. This just carried before dying on the fielder, who looked late as he reacted to it
gets this one to nip in sharply from outside off as it went across Andri . Not much separating that from timber really
delivers a full, inswinging delivery which slips too far down the leg side
fuller delivery outside of off which tails in as it passes by the batsman, who elects to leave it
gets the line wrong once more as this just swings away down the leg side as Amjad attempted a vain flick

looks to glide one past the slip as the fielder fires in a throw. Ends up making a direct hit which affords the batsmen the run they wanted. Needless throw really as the batsman was already in by the time the throw was made
straight delivery on middle and leg which is defended by the batsman
length delivery which just comes back as Andri defends to the leg side
safely negotiated by the batsman to end the over
chases after this full delivery which is delivered wide of off, but is late on it as he gets low for the drive
gets elevated bounce to this just back of a length outside off and creeping into the batsman
short of a length which leaps high over the bat as he attempts a pull through midwicket
gets this 138 kph delivery to nibble away a touch after delivering wide of off stump on a back of a length, with the batsman seemingly playing at an imaginary line closer to the body
this time shifts the line closer to the body to oblige the batsman's previous attempt at a back foot defence
elects to let this one fly through outside off to the keeper to end another good, searching over from Irfan
length delivery which tapers to the leg side as he tickles this one down to fine leg
full delivery which targets middle and leg as the batsman fends away
short of a length now which is treated with respect by the batsman
shortish length which he tries to swivel and pull behind through backward square, but doesn't quite time it away as he would have liked
fuller length on the pads which is nudged away to the leg side
ducks under this steepler which is taken cleanly by Umar Akmal at the back
pitches a fuller one well wide of off which does not engage the left-hander
gets the batsman to play at this fuller one closer to the body, with this stopped in the end by the slip

bowls an almost unplayable delivery just outside off, and on a fuller length, as Amjad takes the bait to go for a drive, with the ball nipping away from the outside edge as he went through with the stroke
slips down the pads now as this is clipped away just behind of square
finds the yorker on leg-stump, which is just dug out by Andri
fires this one in on a length which crashes into the thigh of Andri as he got cramped for room. Gets on his haunches after to try and shrug off the pain
full and sent back along the same angle as he presents the full face to time this one down the ground. Graceful straight drive which is able to find the boundary
defended from within the confines of his crease as he continues to look to play straight
tries to steer this one past the man at backward point, but to no avail
short delivery, heading down the leg side, as Amjad works with the angle to hook this away fine for a boundary
short of a length and pushed away to the off side by the batsman
bangs in a short one which has Amjad swinging for the fences as Umar has to get really high in the air to complete the take
gets a touch forward to cover for any movement as the over comes to an end
delivers a full delivery on middle and leg which is glanced away behind of square
able to steal a single after re-directing this back of a length towards the leg side
short of a length and shaping away a great deal as it passes the batsman
gets exaggerated movement outside of off as this is given wide by the umpire

and Rahat makes the first breakthrough as Amjad, who was feeling for deliveries outside his off stump, ends up chopping on this back of a length onto the stumps. Rahat exults as he picks up a wicket in his very first over
and he survives his first delivery, albeit not so convincingly as he tries to get a feather on this length delivery going across and swinging in upon passing the bat
this time fires one in on the pads as Rahat goes up for the appeal, but this may have struck just outside
elects to shoulder arms to this length delivery outside of off
length delivery outside of off which gets some away shape as Akmal completes the take

and Sohail now adds to his wicket tally as he gets Andri to play at this fuller delivery, offering a thick outside edge to the keeper, who completes it with aplomb. UAE now 19 for 2 in the eighth over, and still facing a massive chase

it is all happening in Napier. Starts with a full length delivery which raps the pads after tailing in, or at least appears to do so, as they go up for the appeal. In the midst of all that confusion, the two batsmen, who are watching the umpire, give Pakistan a chance for a run-out at both ends, which they fail rather miserably in pulling off
gets nicely behind the line of this back of a length outside of off
ends the over with a full delivery on the pads which is tucked away to the leg side
gets appreciable bounce to this shortish length outside off which has the batsman doing his best Neo impression
wafts rather lazily at this back of a length whistling outside off
defended off the back foot, and to the off side by Khurram
full delivery on the pads which is clipped away through midwicket for three runs
tries to force away this fuller length going across him, but to no avail
fuller length, outside of off and shaping in as it past the batsman to the keeper
steered away off the back foot through backward point for a single
attempts to work away a single on the leg side, but doesn't quite time it so
surprises Krishna with a shortish length which has him covering up to avoid the delivery. Lucky for that not to catch an edge though
this time gets nicely behind the line of the ball outside of off
looking to guide one on the up through mid-off, but finds the fielder soon after
bangs in a short one which climbs very high over the batsman. Called wide ultimately

Sohail picks up another as Krishna's eleven-ball vigil comes to a swift end as he offers a straightforward outside edge to Akmal, who is able to complete the catch with an acrobatic dive to his right. Was really struggling to get the ball away as he departs the oval for an ignominious duck
punishes this short, wide delivery, which is put away with a powerful cut behind of square
this time looking to tuck away the bowler on the leg side, but Shaiman doesn't want the single despite advancing a few steps after
another leg-side slanting delivery which is nudged away by the batsman
fuller length on middle and off which is defended off the back foot towards the off side
looks to be positive with another drive through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder in question
waits on the back foot before fending away the left-armer to the off side
gets a nice stride in before defending this fuller one away to the off side
tries to get after this fuller delivery which nibbles away a touch upon passing the flashing blade
has found a lovely length just outside off as Shaiman plays down the wrong line
back of a length delivery just outside off, Anwar defends it into the off side
short of a length delivery outside off. Anwar flashes at it, but the ball goes past the outside edge
defends this one by getting his body nicely behind the line
steers this back of a length delivery outside of off to the fielder at third man
rides the bounce of this back of a length going across
defended from the back foot as he continues to bang away at a short of a length line
this time elects to let the ball go through on its original path to the keeper
has a go at this length delivery shaping in as it went across, but is late on the delivery
and this time Shaiman gets off the mark with a deft flick off the pads to keep the strike
fuller length on and around off which is safely negotiated by Shaiman
punches away this length delivery on the same channel, but picks out the close-in fielder
tries to swat away this short of a length through midwicket, but the ball is onto him a bit quicker than he expected
times this push off the back foot to pierce the gap between point and cover for a boundary. Just raced away as he seemed to merely caress it away
gets nicely under this steepler from Sohail, which ends up being called one for the over
short, and well wide of off, as Shaiman plays an outrageous ramp over the backward point region to pickup half a dozen as this just sailed over the rope
looks to force this back of a length outside off, ultimately getting this one away square off the wicket
length delivery, just outside off, which is allowed through to the keeper
tries to laser one through mid-off, but finds the fielder right away
length delivery which is negotiated safely by the batsman
gets nicely behind the line of this fuller one slanting across
elects not to meddle with this length delivery which goes across him as the over comes to a close
begins with a nice, full delivery just outside off which shapes in towards the off stump
length delivery on and around off which is handled with ease by Khurram
full again, just outside of off, as Shaiman shuts the gate
tries to guide this one on the front foot past point, but fails in his attempt
length outside off which earns Khurram a fortuitous boundary as he chops this one on to get away a streaky stroke through fine leg
plays just inside of the line to defend this one away towards the off side
slides this one down the leg side as Shaiman fails to get any bat on it
defends this one darted in just outside off
cut away to the man at sweeper cover
flighted on the leg-stump as this is flicked away behind of square
looks for the booming drive through the covers, but ends up hitting a bit straighter to long off
safely tucks away this delivery on middle and leg which turns to the leg side
gets away a single just behind of square on the off side to end the over
needles a single through third man with a flick of the wrists
defends this length delivery on middle and off from Riaz
opens the face to glide this length delivery down to the fielder at third man
gets away this uppish pull towards deep square-leg, with the fielder in the end able to pull this one back before the rope
fails to get away the pull through midwicket, but is still able to get off strike as the fielder is a bit lax as he approached the ball
short enough to swivel and pull to the fielder at deep backward square
tucks away this one sliding in on middle and leg towards midwicket
gives this plenty of air as this is drilled straight to long off
tries to pick the gap on the leg side, but fails to do so
this time given room to free his arms and run this one down to third man
driven away through the covers by Shaiman to get Khurram on strike
slapped away through the covers as this just races away from the chasing fielders
elects to leave this length delivery which shapes in a touch upon pitching
tries to steer one past the slipper, but fails to do so
whips away this back of a length to midwicket, running the first one hard enough before returning in time for the second
goes for the good ole tap-and-run outside of off as they sneak a quick single
is well late on this bouncer from Wahab which is signalled one for the over
straddles down leg, and on a shortish length, as this is glanced away to deep fine leg
looks to nurdle a single on the leg side, before a fine, diving stop quells that notion
tries once more to sneak away a single, but is held by the fielder
this time looking to direct it away through midwicket, but to no avail
this time dabs away outside of off to third man
fended away to the leg side as he looks to pick the gaps
nicely behind the line to cover any turn on this one pitched up on middle and leg
defended by the batsman as he pushed forward towards Riaz
tucks away the left-arm fast bowler to the leg side
this time succeeds in getting it past backward point to find a couple of runs before third man came round
whisks away the bowler off the pads as the ball ends up near short backward square. Gets them to their fifty-run stand as well
short of a length and Khurram works with the line to pick this up beautifully, ultimately sending this one for a six over long leg
gets nicely behind the line of this back of a length on and around off

floated on middle as this one is defended on the front foot. Shehzad, who was looking to be positive as he fielded the ball at backward point, ends up slipping and clutching his leg. Hopefully he is okay though
this time worked away to the off side
bobbles a chance over towards the cover fielder, with this one falling short of the man
this time drilled back to the bowler in his follow through
looks to come down the track before adjusting at the last moment to cut this one away through the covers
gives this one plenty of rip before it was eased down to long on
delivers a steep bouncer which has Shaiman ducking for cover
fails to whip away this back of a length through the leg side, with the ball bobbling over to the off side, but away from any fielders
solidly behind the line of this back of a length going across
looks to guide away the fast bowler over backward point, but the man makes an excellent leaping save to his left to stop this one in its tracks
is late on the attempted pull over midwicket, with this one getting appreciable bounce on the way over
wafts at this back of a length slanting across as he looked to get in the late cut
fails to get away the late cut behind of square
given plenty of flight as this is flicked away uppishly between short mid-on and square-leg
cut away fiercely off the back foot as sweeper cover fires in a flat throw to the keeper, but is unable to prevent the second from being taken
driven firmly down to long off for one
reaches the man at deep midwicket with one bounce after carting the leggie
mistimes the drive through long on as the ball ends up on the off side near Afridi
and starts rather inauspiciously with a wide down the leg side
this time drifts onto the pads as this is tucked away on the leg side for one
safely negotiated by the batsman to the leg side
looking to open the face and dab this down third man, but is unable to get it away
driven firmly down towards long off, with mid-off coming round to cut this off rather abruptly
tries to get under this fuller one darted in as he hits more to the leg side
drags the length as this one is steered away straight to backward point
bit of turn for Afridi. Anwar waits and dabs it to short third man
worked away towards the off side by the batsman
nice loopy delivery just outside off, Khan goes for the inside out loft, ends up slicing it towards deep cover, Riaz runs across, dives and hauls it in just before the rope.
picks up a single through midwicket
defended away to the leg side by the batsman
backs away before hammering this one straight to the man at long off
defended by the batsman
fails to get away the cut as this just bounces over the bat to the keeper
this time able to glance away behind of square, but picks out the fielder at short backward square
eased away off the back foot, but can't find any space on the leg side
another one worked away on the leg side
Shaiman announces himself to a dozing Napier crowd as he lifts this darted in delivery from Maqsood high over long off for a glorious six. Just seemed to get higher and higher as it sailed
darts one in on middle and leg which is nudged away
flights this one outside off as this is driven straight to deep extra-cover
tries to dab this one off middle past short third man, but fails to do so
gets into position quickly to paddle away Haris over fine leg for a boundary
defended away on the leg side, and with soft hands
fails to pick the one that goes straight on as he just misses the edge as he went for the cut
tries to nudge away a single on the leg side, but is prevented by the two close-in fielders
and finally a wicket falls as Khurram Khan ends up flicking straight to Wahab Riaz at backward square, as he looked for some space on the leg side. Khan is livid as he walks away to the pavilion
tries to get away the bowler behind square on the leg side, but no dice
push-drives it to the left of the bowler
defended by the batsman on the back foot
eases away a single down to long on to retain the strike
defended on the front foot by Swapnil
driven past the bowler in his follow through as this one ends up at long off
content to just push away this delivery outside of off
this time pokes away a run down to long off
driven handsomely, but straight to the man at mid-off
this time slapped away off the back foot towards deep cover
advances down before defending this one back to the bowler
drags the length as Patil is able to short-arm pull this one to deep midwicket
worked away now to the fielder at long on for a single
shimmies down a touch before easing this to the man in the same region
tries to make room to clear the off side, but Maqsood ends up following him
looking for the big slice over extra-cover, with this one dropping safely in the deep and away from any fielders
drives this one past mid-off to find the fielder at long off
defended away with a slightly angled face to the off side
short enough for him to get up and under as he short-arm pulls this over midwicket to pickup another World Cup fifty
defended from the confines of his crease
and he goes for his treasured slice over extra-cover, with this one actually having the legs on it to just tickle the rope in the end
finishes with one that drifts on middle and leg which is turned away behind of square
drags the length as Shaiman fails to bludgeon this one away through the covers, which he should have done
now drives on the up towards long off to pickup a single
clipped away on the leg side by the batsman
touch flatter and on middle and leg, Patil hangs back and punches it back to the bowler
defended by the batsman to the leg side
just gets a tickle on this delivery slanting down the pads. Would have been called a wide if he hadn't tampered with it
drifts one in on middle and off which is worked away to the off side before they set off for a quick single to just make it to the other end despite the shy at the striker's stumps
picks up a single through sweeper cover now
wrong'un which is read well by the batsman as he got forward to defend
gets this one to turn away, and bounce a bit more, as he plays just inside the line
tries to club away this fuller one which is darted in, but to no avail
tries to blast Lala through midwicket with a short-arm pull, but picks out the fielder on the bounce inside of the ring
length delivery just outside off which is defended away to the batsman. No slips or gully in place as Misbah has laid out a pretty defensive field
steers this back of a length going across to the fielder at third man
short of a length on the pads which is glanced away behind of square
driven away through the covers for a rather comfortable single
guided away off the back foot towards the fielder at point
short of a length which Shaiman almost drags on as this bounces dangerously close to the off stump
drifts one on the pads as this one is tucked away behind of square
fails to work away a single through the off side
gets nice and low to defend this one on middle and leg
steered away straight to the short midwicket fielder, who puts in a fine diving stop to his right before looking to effect a run out, but is a touch late on the throw
driven away to the off side, but can't penetrate the gap
looks for the big heave over long off, but is late on the delivery
length delivery which goes across the batsman as he plays just inside of the line

ramps away this short delivery through backward point, with Sohail, who is already suffering, having to put in a rolling stop to try and stop this. Took him a bit of time to get up as well after, so things not looking particularly rosy for the Pakistan fast men
has a waft at this back of a length going across, with the batsman late on it
short of a length and slanting across as this one is allowed through to the keeper
short of a length and defended away off the back foot towards the covers
thuds into the pads as the batsman fails to get away the whip through square-leg

and the new leading World Cup run-scorer finally departs as he looks to take on long off with a big hit over his head, but doesn't get enough on this to go the distance, with Nasir Jamshed able to get settled under it. Pakistan will be dearly happy to see the back of Shaiman, but they still need five more wickets to wrap this one up in a hurry
beats him with a wrong 'un as this one gets away from Rohan as he looked to fend it away

and Rohan's stay comes to a premature end as he whacks this next ball, looking to reverse sweep, on the full to backward point, who didn't even have to move an inch as this landed straight in his lap. Rohan Mustafa leaves with a silver duck under his name
driven towards the off side, but can't pinch the single
slips down the leg side as this is called a wide by the umpire
another drifting down leg which is penalised by the umpire
slower through the air and turning away from the batsman, Javed defends from the crease
defended away to the off side by the batsman
looks like he may have just got a tickle to this leg-side delivery, with the ball appearing to have come off the gloves as it went past Akmal's foot to fine leg, but called leg byes in the end
rides the top of the bounce to fend this one away to the off side
fires a lovely bouncer which has the batsman weaving out of the way
able to steer one past a flying gully through third man
slow bouncer which Javed decides not to go after, despite looking like he may initially
short on a middle to off stump line as Javed cannot be enticed to have a go
drifts one in on middle and leg which is safely handled by the batsman
nicely behind the turn as this is fended away
content to just work this one away from the relative safety of his crease
given plenty of flight to this one turning away outside off
flights in the wrong 'un which almost spells Swapnil's demise as he looked to drive away through the covers, with the ball catching the inside edge
gets this one to spin past the defensive blade of Swapnil to end the over. Also ends his fine spell of 2 for 35 in ten overs
short one down the leg side which the batsman run the extra for as Akmal fails to complete a rolling take behind
shortish length which is defended at the top of the bounce
has a go at this shortish length flying by outside off, but is late on the delivery
gets wonderful carry to this shorter one in the same channel, with Swapnil stupefied momentarily by just how much that climbed
another one outside of off which the batsman fails to get after
slower delivery on middle and leg which is tucked away behind of square for a well-ran brace
bends his back to steer this shortish length outside of off, but picks out backward point
almost gets Swapnil to drag this back of a length as he defended from the crease
would have said this was a drop, but this fell well short of him at slip as he dove low to his right. Swapnil ends up feathering an edge which dies a couple of feet before the slipper
this time carved away square off the wicket to get off the strike
back of a length around off, Javed toe-ends the punch to backward point
short of length on off, Javed jumps up and blocks it down the wicket
shortish and angled across off, Javed has a late poke and is beaten
gets great carry across the batsman as he fails to get any bat on it. That last ball came in at 149 kph!
tries to cut away at the top of the bounce, square off the wicket, but finds point
goes aerially through backward point, with the fielder putting in a dive to his left, but this races away past the fielder at third man to the boundary
attacks this short of a length outside of off, but is late on it as he has a go
goes round the wicket now as Swapnil laces this length delivery through to deep cover
cut away behind of square on the off side, with the sub, Yasir Shah, putting in good work at the boundary edge to cut this off before the rope
full and in the slot as he carves away a single through point
able to tuck away this back of a length on the hips towards the leg side
waits off the back foot before trying to needle this one past backward point
glides away this back of a length to third man
fended away off the back foot to the off side
bowls a bouncer which gets up far too much on the batsman as the umpire signals wide
fuller length now, just outside off, which is negotiated by Javed
Swapnil doesn't need a sighter as he attacks this length delivery outside of off, getting away a streaky shot through third man
Javed just bludgeons this length delivery from Sohail through the line to pickup a boundary through long off
slower delivery on middle and off which is sent high and mighty over cow corner as Javed has a big, beaming smile after the tonk. Won't forget that one anytime soon!
Javed just having a good time in Napier as he now proceeds to whack Sohail, with the intention of going over midwicket, but ends up slapping away the pace bowler through deep extra-cover instead
looks to send this shorter one from Sohail over McLean Park, but is late on the delivery as he went for the lofted pull
slower ball and this time Javed has got all of it to send this one to the moon as it takes a bit of time to descend back into our realm at cow corner. Massive 99-metre six from Javed!
full delivery, just outside of off, which is driven straight towards deep cover
is well late on this fuller delivery going across him as it hustles past the off stump
fails to get away this attempted scythe through the covers
delivers a yorker outside of off which Javed fails to get up and under
another yorker, outside off, which Javed is unable to get any willow on
nicely behind this fuller one on middle and off to see out the over
begins from round the wicket as Javed fails to get any bat on this wide delivery
slams Riaz over cow corner with a mistimed blow, as he is kept to three runs. Brings up their fifty-run stand as well

gets away with this slap over third man, but Jamshed is able to make a has of it as he slips soon after picking up the ball, before having to recover again on his feet to go back and fire in the throw from the deep. Has just not been his day today
full and wide of off as Swapnil is able to get bat on ball to bring Javed back on strike

Javed, looking to slam Riaz over midwicket, ends up getting a thick outside edge as he went early into the shot, with the ball bobbling over through third man to find a useful boundary. Also takes them past the 195-run mark
backs away before mistiming a slap towards the cover fielder. Still manages to get to the other end when he sees the fielder hesitate with the throw
looking for the blockhole but ends up dishing a low full toss which is clubbed away by Javed towards mid-off
tries to get under this full, wide delivery outside of off, but fails to do so
tries to pummel Sohail out of the park over midwicket, but is late on the shorter one that is fired in
Javed better frame that bat after as he gets away another streaky shot, this time the inside-edge through fine leg, as he looked to smash the bowler over long on
lovely yorker which missed the downswing of Javed's bat as he looked to get under it. Followed the batsman beautifully there
backs away and then lifts Sohail inside-out over the covers to find the boundary at a rate of knots. Has put on a clinic with some sound shots interspersed with late bludgeons and French cuts
punches this back of a length through to the cover fielder, but can't pinch the single
backs away a touch as Wahab delivers this one wide of off, and round the wicket, with the umpire penalising him for straying the margin

and Javed's jolly good time comes to a suitable end as he attempts yet another club over midwicket, with this one finally falling to a Pakistan fielder in the deep as Sohail Khan steadies himself under the catch. Leaves McLean Park with a host of good memories I am sure
looks to ramp the bowler over backward point, with this one falling safely in the deep in the end
looks to slam this bouncer going down the leg side over midwicket, but is late on it. Called one for the over

where was that all this time? delivers a vicious yorker from round the wicket which is just too good for the batsman as he backed away to try and create space to get under it. Far too late in the contest to really matter though...
and he safely negotiates the full delivery on off to help UAE get through their full quota of overs, with two wickets still in hand
